channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Instagram updates its Map feature to make it easier to tell if you’re sharing your location
item.description: Instagram is adding a more prominent indicator at the top of the Map to remind users whether or not they’re sharing their location.

item.title: Best Bike Helmets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested and reviewed the best helmets for road cycling, commuting, mountain biking, and more.

item.title: How to Get Your Kids Into STEM Even When Its Future Is Uncertain
item.description: Thinking about science and technology in terms of return on investment misses the point. Here’s what kids really need to know.

item.title: AMD to supply 6GW of compute capacity to OpenAI in chip deal worth tens of billions
item.description: AMD has signed a multi-year chip supply deal with OpenAI that could generate tens of billions in revenue for the chipmaker, helping accelerate its mom...

item.title: 6 Best Mesh Wi-Fi Systems (2025), Tested in a Tech Reviewer's Home
item.description: Forget about patchy internet connections and dead spots in the house. These WIRED-tested multiroom mesh systems will get you online in no time.

item.title: Inside Microsoft’s AI bet with CTO Kevin Scott at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Microsoft CTO Kevin Scott joins the Disrupt Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to share how one of the world’s largest technology companies is navigatin...

item.title: Firefly leans into its defense ambitions with $855M SciTec acquisition
item.description: Firefly Aerospace has agreed to buy defense analytics firm SciTec for about $855 million in cash and stock as the company tries to push deeper into th...

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 exhibit tables are selling out fast and time is running out
item.description: Exhibit tables at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 are almost gone. We expanded the floor two weeks ago due to hot demand — and those extra tables are nearly s...

item.title: 16 Best Camera Bags, Slings, Straps, and Backpacks (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Tote your photo and video gear around in style. We tested more than 80 packs and rounded up our favorites.

item.title: 13 Best Travel Adapters (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: When going abroad, the right plugs are essential to keep your gadgets charged. These are our favorite travel adapters and chargers.
